category: Referee Committee Regulations/Article 26 (Rewards of Referees, etc.)
contents: Article 26 (Rewards for referees, etc.) ① Member sports organizations may award commendations to the Sports Council for judges who excel in referee evaluation and education, and may grant incentives when referees are promoted. ② Member sports organizations may request training at international organizations from the Korea Sports Council for excellent referees. [Title revised December 27, 2021]
